title: Schema for Channel JSON object for ingest

channel_type.description: Type of Scaling - Isotropic(1) or Normal(0)

exceptions.description: Enable exceptions - Yes(1) or No(0) (for annotation data)

windowrange.description: Window clamp function for 16-bit channels with low max value of pixels

readonly.description: Read-only Channel(1) or Not(0). You can remotely post to channel if it is not readonly and overwrite data

data_url.description: This url points to the root directory of the files. Dropbox is not an acceptable HTTP Server.

file_format.description: This is the file format type. For now we support only Slice stacks and CATMAID tiles.

file_type.description: This the file type the data is stored in
